title: Medium: Maximal Rectangle
description:
Given a 2D binary matrix `matrix` where each element is either 0 (representing an empty cell) or 1 (representing a live cell),
#### Input
- `matrix` (list of lists): A 2D binary matrix where each element is either 0 or 1.
#### Output
- Returns an integer representing the maximum area that can be obtained by flipping at most one 0-cell in the given matrix.
#### Constraints and Hints
- You can only flip at most one 0-cell to get the maximal rectangle.
- The size of the matrix is between 1x1 and 100x100.
- You are allowed to use a height map approach for this problem.
